direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle error code components (class and number) with similar validation logic and exception handling.
Both methods involve setting error codes, but setErrorCode combines class and number into a single code.
The getErrorClass method complements setErrorClass by retrieving the error class, making it useful for testing both setting and getting operations.
Both methods access and manipulate error-related information, though getDefaultReasonPhrase focuses on providing a reason phrase for a given error code.
Both methods involve setting error-related information, though setReasonPhrase focuses on setting a reason phrase for the error.
